 Nothing is impossible, it all depends on how much time you have to spend on it 

<About me/>

Hi, I am a self-taught programmer who was interested in technology and computers from a young age. Due to turmoil in my personal life, I stopped programming and studying computer science. I have successfully returned to programming for the past 2 years and am constantly expanding my skills - my goal is to become a real specialist in Frontend Development.

I am a persistent and patient person who never give up until resolve the problem, in line with my motto.

When creating websites and applications, I focus on RWD (Responsive Web Design), semantic HTML, accessibility and performance, without omission aesthetics and good looking design.

Here you can find technologies and skills I am using to work with:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript
  • SASS
  • TailwindCSS
  • Gulp.js
  • Parcel.js
  • npm
  • GIT
  • MySQL
  • Postman

<Projects/>

Ten Vape

  • HTML/CSS/JS
  • SCSS
  • BEM
  • Gulp
  • Swiper.js
  • A11Y

Business website for a local e-cigarette store. My first commercial project entirely designed and implemented by myself with full hosting configuration. In implementation, I focused on improving accessibility and performance. I used external libraries such as 'Swiper.js' and build it with Gulp.js

View Project

M-Data

  • HTML/CSS/JS
  • SCSS
  • BEM
  • Parcel.js
  • Swiper.js
  • OOP
  • MVC
  • A11Y

Individual project - Single Page Portfolio dedicated to Data Analyst. The main objective was to present the analyst's biography, skills and Power BI reports. My wholly designed and developed site was implemented with Object-Oriented Programming approach and Model-View-Controller Pattern. To build it, I used Parcel.js.
